clues.clue: Okay, we've been savin' / His poem, "The Raven" / But to go even deeper / Check out "The Sleeper"

final_jeopardy.clue: On Oct. 14, 1947 in the Mojave Desert the first of these sounds was made by man; it was the byproduct of another first
